newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritian rupee weaker on dollar, firmer on pound.
newsitem.headline: Mauritian rupee weaker on dollar, firmer on pound.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee weakened against the dollar and strengthened against the pound on Tuesday, reflecting international trends, foreign exchange dealers aid.
The rupee was posted at a mean commercial rate of 20.547 to the dollar from 20.4665 on Monday. Against the pound, the rupee traded at a mean commercial rate of 33.324 from 33.354 on Monday.
Dealers said the central bank sold dollars to a commercial bank on the interbank market on Tuesday morning at the prevailing interbank rate.
